page.title: 14HIGH BEECH CHURCH.
page.content: The Revd.Paul Haworth,M.A. The church at high beech is an old stone church and has a steeple.It is surrounded by a small grave yard which is overgrown.Most of the graves are 1950s but some are older.At the church a sponsored walk in May raised 200 pounds for an oak tree. Services are 41 pounds for marriage,35 pounds for funerals,baptism is free but certificates are 2 pounds. CHURCH DIARY FOR JULY 1985. 3rd July Even song. 7th July family service. 9th July organ recital. 10th July High Beech womans fellowship. 12th July meeting to discuss road closures. 16th July shoppers bus to Waltham Abbey 21st July forest horse rangers show. LOCAL EVENTS Garden open at Bantham cottage.
